actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Smithsonian Institution to construct museum support facilities.

summary.text: Authorizes the regents of the Smithsonian Institution to construct museum support facilities for: (1) the care and conservation of national collections of scientific, historic, and artistic objects; (2) documentation related to such collection; and (3) the training of museum conservators. Authorizes appropriations of such sums as may be necessary to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Smithsonian Institution to construct museum support facilities.
